string-array.name: alarm_set
string-array.item: Timing backup enabled, the next backup will start in 1 minute.
Timing backup enabled, the next backup will start after %1$s.
Timing backup enabled, the next backup will start after %2$s.
Timing backup enabled, the next backup will start after %1$s %2$s.
Timing backup enabled, the next backup will start in %3$s.
Timing backup enabled, the next backup will start after %1$s %3$s.
Timing backup enabled, the next backup will start after %2$s %3$s.
Timing backup enabled, the next backup will start after %1$s %2$s %3$s.
